title: Slab Serif Font used here — http://p3.publico.pt — Not ChunkFive but similar
content:
It has several weights — shown here are just two of them.  
The two similar fonts I know are ChunkFive and Egytian Slate.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/A_6590.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/B_6720.jpg)
  
Thanks
author: dito

comments.content: The Safari inspector says the font is Popular [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Popular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084850/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Popular/ "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Popular/")
